title: Location Entity Schema
description: Defines the structure for a Location entity in the adventure game platform. Locations are entities composed of components.

id.description: A unique identifier for this location entity (e.g., 'core:room_entry', 'story_alpha:cave_chamber_1'). Used for linking connections and references.

components.description: A container for the components that define this location's properties and behavior.

Name.description: Component defining the display name of the location.

Description.description: Component defining the static, pre-written narrative description of the location.

MetaDescription.description: Component providing concise keywords for generating dynamic descriptions via an LLM (used in Phase 3+).

Connections.description: Component defining the exits or links from this location to others.

EntitiesPresent.description: (Optional) Component listing the IDs of entities currently present in this location.

anyOf.description: Ensures that the location has at least a static description.
Ensures that the location has at least a meta-description for AI generation.

value.description: The primary display name or title of the location (e.g., 'Dark Corridor', 'Command Bridge').

text.description: The full, pre-written narrative text describing the location. Displayed if present and LLM generation is disabled or fails.

keywords.description: A list of concise keywords or short phrases describing the location's key features, atmosphere, or contents (e.g., ['damp stone', 'flickering torchlight', 'smell of decay', 'distant dripping']). Used as input for LLM description generation.

ConnectionsComponent.description: Component defining the exits or links from this location to others.

connections.description: A list defining pathways leading out of this location.

items.description: Defines a single connection or exit.

direction.description: The direction or label for this exit (e.g., 'north', 'south', 'up', 'enter airlock', 'follow path'). Used for player commands/UI.

target.description: The unique ID of the location this connection leads to.

description_override.description: Optional text describing this specific exit (e.g., 'A heavy iron door stands to the north.', 'Sunlight streams down the path leading west.'). If omitted, a generic description might be used.

type.description: Optional type of connection (e.g., 'door', 'path', 'portal', 'ladder'). Can influence travel time, description, or required actions.

hidden.description: Optional flag indicating if the connection is initially hidden and must be discovered.

initial_state.description: Optional state the connection starts in when the location is loaded (e.g., 'locked', 'hidden', 'blocked'). If omitted, assumed to be 'unlocked' or determined by 'hidden' property. Triggers/events modify the runtime state.

interactions.description: Defines interactions possible with this connection, often involving tests.

action_id.description: The ID of the action that triggers this interaction (e.g., 'core:action_force_open').

requires_state.description: Optional state the connection must be in for this interaction to be available (e.g., 'locked').

requires_item_tag.description: Optional item tag the actor must possess in inventory (e.g., 'lockpick', 'key'). Checked by interaction system.

test_definition.description: The test performed when this interaction is attempted.

EntitiesPresentComponent.description: Lists the IDs of entities currently present within this entity (typically used for Locations).

entityIds.description: Array of entity identifier strings present.
